title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package' behavior observed when performing the following steps: 1. Create a new project named xxx. 2. Select a package in project A from the package viewer. 3. From the context menu, choose 'copy'. 4. Select xxx as the destination. The expected behavior is that the destination should be 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' instead of xxx.
OB: The package is being copied to xxx instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new project named xxx. 2. Select a package in project A from the package viewer. 3. From the context menu, choose 'copy'. 4. Select xxx as the destination.
